Description: Wild spells are flying all around the dungeon!|Do your best to get them under control.
Rules Description: A Wild Spell appears each turn.|A spell will [yellow]escape[] your book every few turns.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Burning Light~[;]~Spell:Electric Shock~[;] ~Spell:Ice Shard~[;] ~Spell:Sonic Wave~]| 2); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Doppeldice~[;]  ~Spell:Duplicate~]); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~ExtraDice~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]);
Script: Start Game: Spellbook.showspellbookinstructions = false; Rules.witch_randomspellslot = true; Rules.excludeenemies([~Copycat~]); var escapecountdown = 3;
Script: On Start Turn: var scd = self.getvar(~escapecountdown~); var scv = 0; var candidates = []; if(scd==0){if(turn==1){self.setvar(~escapecounddown~|1);}else{for(i in 1...7){if(!Spellbook.isempty(i)&&Spellbook.spellname(i)!=~Capture~){candidates.push(i);} }scv = rand(candidates); trace(Spellbook.spellname(scv)+~ escaped!~); Spellbook.erase(scv); self.setvar(~escapecountdown~|rand([3|4|2])); sfx(~_vanish~);}}else{self.setvar(~escapecountdown~|scd-1);}

Description: Oh god[;] we've given you the wrong spellbook!|That thing has [yellow]a mind of it's own![]|I hope you can manage to wrangle it!
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Burning Light~[;]~Spell:Electric Shock~[;] ~Spell:Ice Shard~[;] ~Spell:Sonic Wave~]| 2); leveluprewards(4[;] ~WitchPrecast~[;] [~Spell:Doppeldice~[;]  ~Spell:Duplicate~]); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~WitchUpgrade~[;] ~WitchPrecast~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~~[;] [~Spell:Burning Light~[;]~Spell:Electric Shock~[;] ~Spell:Ice Shard~[;] ~Spell:Sonic Wave~]| 2);

Rules Description: Enemies get 10% extra health.|Status effects work differently.|All of the equipment has been changed.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Crescent Moon Blade~[;]~Equipment:Polar Star~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Battering Ram~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: How good are you at running?|That's all you get to do in this one.
Rules Description: Run from enemies rather than fight them.|Steal gold and cripple foes with your equipment.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Spiked Shield~[;]~Equipment:Boomerang~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Shield Bash~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: Go work your usual magic: get in[;]  keep your cards and|calculations close to your chest[;] and manage your|inventory the Warrior-y way... wait[;] what?
Rules Description: Each turn[;] disguise yourself as a random champion.|Everyone's equipment can appear.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: chooseinitialequipment([~InitialEquipment:Battle Axe~[;] ~DoubleEquipment:Lockpick[;]Dagger~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Plasma Blaster[;]Pea Shooter~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Spanner[;]Hammer@Crisis~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Cauldron[;]Ice Shard~[;]~DoubleEquipment:Kapow![;]Bop!~]); leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Buster Sword~[;]~Equipment:Crowbar~[;]~Equipment:Spiked Shield~[;]~Equipment:Sonic Wave~[;]~Equipment:Flamethrower~]|2); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Pirate Hook~[;] ~Equipment:Hacksaw~[;] ~Upgrade~[;]~Copy~[;]~Equipment:Doppeldice~[;]~Equipment:Missing Score~]|3); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);
Script: Before Start Turn: var who = [0|1|2|3|4|5]; var identity=rand(who); var breaks = [~Fury~|~Unlucky Roll~|~Autoroll?~|~Focus~|~Crystal Ball~|~Bingo!~]; var cards = [~Combat Roll@Disguise~|~Borrow~|~Program~|~Inspire~|~Hocus Rocus~|~Redeal~]; self.replaceskillcard(cards[identity]); self.changelimitbreak(breaks[identity]);

Description: This time[;] you're a conman rather than|a pickpocket - trick enemies into|giving you their equipment!
Rules Description: You can swap equipment with your enemies.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Poison Needle~[;]~Equipment:Crowbar~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Skeleton Key~[;] ~Equipment:Hacksaw~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: You've got all the equipment you could ever want!|Just make sure you know what you're doing...
Rules Description: Get an equipment with each dice!
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~CPU:2~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Buster Sword~[;]~Equipment:Ultima Weapon~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~CPU:2~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Heat Sink~[;] ~Equipment:Increment~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~CPU:2~);

Description: Let's raise the stakes! Now you get dealt two dice at once!|...what? Don't you like high stakes?
Rules Description: Get two dice from each Calculation.|Get a dice normally.|Lower CPU.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] [~CPU:3~[;]~Dice~]); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Buster Sword~[;]~Equipment:Ultima Weapon~]); leveluprewards(4[;]  ~~[;] [~CPU:3~[;]~Dice~]); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Heat Sink~[;] ~Equipment:Increment~]); leveluprewards(6[;]  ~~[;] [~CPU:3~[;]~Dice~]);

leveluprewards(2[;] ~~[;] [~Boosterpack:Bonk![;]Bonk![;]Bonk!~[;]~Boosterpack:Forgery[;]Lockpick[;]Lockpick~[;]~Boosterpack:Call For Backup Robot?[;]Buster Sword[;]Buster Sword~[;]~Boosterpack:Trash[;]Trash[;]Hammer~[;]~Boosterpack:Call For Backup Witch[;]Ice Shard[;]Electric Shock~][;] 2); leveluprewards(3[;] ~Equipment:Duplicate~); leveluprewards(4[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Call for Backup Warrior~[;]~Equipment:Call for Backup Witch~[;]~Equipment:Call for Backup Inventor~][;] 2); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Call for Backup Thief~[;]~Equipment:Call for Backup Robot~[;] ~Delete~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Equipment:Duplicate~);

Description: Woah[;] everything's different! |(except your scrap[;] thank god)
Rules Description: Enemies get 10% extra health.|Status effects work differently.|All of the equipment has been changed.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Molotov Cocktail~[;]~Equipment:Doppeltwice~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Upgrade~[;] ~Copy~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: It's PARADICE! There's so much stuff around that...|Come back here! I'm not done!
Rules Description: Your equipment has +1 use each turn.|Equipment is immediately replaced when used.
Script: Start Game: Rules.inventor_inspiration = false; Rules.excludeenemies([~Aurora~[;]~Mimic~[;]~Keymaster~[;]~Crystalina~[;]~Wisp~]); Rules.inventor_equipmentrust = 1; var equips = []; Rules.addextrascript(~var eqq = self.getvar('equipment'); var refreshedeq = []; for(eq in self.equipment){equips.push(eq.name);} for(x in equips){if(eqq.indexof(x)== -1){giveequipment(rand(getequipment()));}} for(eq in self.equipment){refreshedeq.push(eq.name);} self.setvar('equipment'|refreshedeq);~[;] ~playerequipmentuse~);

Description: You like figuring out how stuff works[;] right?|Well[;] your wish is granted...
Rules Description: The dungeon is full of mysterious equipment.
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Baffling Blueprint~[;]~Equipment:Hatchblade~[;]~Equipment:Puzzle Box~[;]~Equipment:Matroyshka@6~]|2); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Upgrade~[;] ~Copy~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);

Description: Every roll you make will be perfect!|Lucky you...
Script: Define Level Up Rewards: leveluprewards(2[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(3[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Poison Needle~[;]~Equipment:Wrecking Ball~]); leveluprewards(4[;] ~Dice~); leveluprewards(5[;] ~~[;] [~Equipment:Berlin Key~[;] ~Equipment:Glass Cauldron~[;] ~Upgrade~]); leveluprewards(6[;] ~Dice~);
